post:
<center>We are proud to announce the launch of our 11th location in Los Angeles which has been promised for a long time.
As such, we have a few special offers which we have extended to a few other locations to celebrate the launch.
As always, we have opted for only the best hardware utilizing a Core i9-9900K, a 10gbps network port with both NVMe and HDD storage.


<font size="3"><b><u>Features</u></b></font>
Virtualizor Control Panel
Numerous Choice Of OS and ISO
Nested Virtualisation
Stackable
Scalable RAM
Scalable Storage
Scalable Bandwidth
Additional IPs (£1.49/m)
1 Snapshot Backup/Restore Per Month
NoVNC Console
24/7 Support
Custom ISO Uploads 
RDNS (LA Only)

<u><b>256MB Offers</b></u>

1vcore
256MB RAM
7GB Storage
300GB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6
<font color="red"><b>Order</b></font>: LA ([HDD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1039), [NVMe SSD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1040)), Kansas ([HDD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1042), [SSD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1041)), Dallas ([HDD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1045), [NVMe SSD](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=1043))
